com.redhat.rhn.testing
Class RhnMockExceptionJspWriter

java.lang.Object
  JspWriter
      com.redhat.rhn.testing.RhnMockExceptionJspWriter

public class RhnMockExceptionJspWriter
extends JspWriter

RhnMockExceptionJspWriter is a mock implementation of a J2EE JspWriter which throws an IOException for EVERY method. This class should be used to test exception handling code in your taglibs.

          Always throws an exception.Constructor
